title: Google assistant ambient mode for pixel 4?
content:
I am still baffled at how this is not a setting on Pixel devices, why do I have to buy a proprietary wireless charger to have Google assistant ambient mode on my pixel 4 xl or any android device? 

Why can't Google enable ambient mode for google assistant on all android devices that support google assistant?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
